channel.title: neurons on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in neurons on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-25
item.description: Reddit app revamp adds a Discover Tab for finding communities, new navigation (4 minute read) Reddit has launched the first major change to its mobile app in two years.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-29
item.description: Apple still working on multi-device charger, a future where all devices ‘can charge each other’ (2 minute read) Apple is working on a multi-device charger for its products as well as short and long-distance wireless charging.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-09
item.description: Google is planning a new Silicon Valley campus with hardware hub, plans show (4 minute read) Google is planning to build another Silicon Valley campus, dubbed ‘Midpoint’, with a center partly devoted to hardware.
